annotation.spannedText: These outbreaks demonstrate how certain population groups are susceptible to getting mumps due to lack of previous vaccination or incomplete vaccination

annotation.spannedText: because of the safety, effectiveness and low cost of mumps vaccine it makes sense to vaccinate children

annotation.spannedText: Mumps encephalitis has virtually disappeared from countries with effective vaccination programs.
